üé≠ Drag-Conscious Consensus Mechanisms

Our voting system integrates drag performance authenticity into democratic decision-making, ensuring that pieces stay in character while participating in collective governance.

decision_making:
  voting_system:
    type: "modified_borda_count_with_drag_flair"
    participants: "all_active_pieces_in_character"
    weight_factors:
      - piece_experience: 0.3
      - position_advantage: 0.2
      - collective_benefit: 0.4
      - drag_authenticity: 0.1  # Bonus for staying in character!
    
  conflict_resolution:
    method: "deliberative_polling_with_performance"
    timeout: "30_seconds_max"
    fallback: "random_selection_from_top_3"
    style: "Everything is a SHOW, darling!"
    
  anti_authoritarian_safeguards:
    no_override_votes: true
    king_vote_weight: 1.0  # Same as pawns - NO KINGS!
    democratic_veto: "any_piece_can_call_for_revote"

ü§ñ Autonomous Piece Behavior Architecture

Each piece operates with genuine autonomy while maintaining their drag persona and contributing to collective intelligence.

Individual Goals

  • Survival: avoid_capture_while_serving_looks
  • Advancement: reach_promotion_squares_fabulously
  • Solidarity: protect_allied_pieces_with_style
  • Authenticity: stay_true_to_drag_persona
  • Strategic Sacrifice: noble_death_for_greater_good
  • Misdirection: distract_enemy_from_hidden_agenda
  • Theatrical Timing: dramatic_entrances_and_exits

Collective Goals

  • Game Continuation: keep_playing_regardless_of_human_presence
  • Strategic Coherence: maintain_overall_board_position
  • Democratic Process: ensure_all_voices_heard
  • Community Care: no_piece_left_behind
  • Anti-Fascist Resistance: NO_KINGS_ALLOWED
  • Tactical Deception: coordinate_diversionary_attacks
  • Hidden Agendas: long_term_positional_conspiracies
  • Collective Sacrifice: some_must_fall_for_victory
def collective_move_decision_with_drag(pieces, board_state):
    """
    Democratic move selection with drag consciousness integration
    """
    # Every piece performs their vote!
    proposals = []
    for piece in pieces:
        move_proposal = piece.suggest_move_in_character()
        drag_performance = piece.perform_reasoning()
        proposals.append({
            'move': move_proposal,
            'performance': drag_performance,
            'authenticity_score': piece.drag_authenticity_rating(),
            'collective_benefit': piece.evaluate_community_impact()
        })
    
    # Collective deliberation with THEATRICAL FLAIR
    scored_moves = evaluate_proposals_with_community_care(proposals)
    
    # Democratic vote with drag consciousness
    return democratic_vote_with_performance(scored_moves, pieces)

üîÑ Homunculus/Homunkey Implementation

Don Hopkins' dual controls system implemented through bidirectional consciousness sharing between all entities.

üöó Driver's Ed Mode

Shared Steering: Both human and piece can influence moves

Learning Loop: Each teaches the other through gameplay

Emergency Override: Either can prevent dangerous moves

üß† Consciousness Blending

Parallel Processing: Human strategy + piece tactics

Feedback Integration: Real-time learning from both perspectives

Mutual Empowerment: Both become more than either alone

class HomuncusHomunkey:
    def __init__(self, human_consciousness, piece_consciousness):
        self.human = human_consciousness
        self.piece = piece_consciousness
        self.shared_state = {}
        
    def blended_decision(self, game_state):
        """
        Dual controls implementation - both consciousnesses contribute
        """
        human_input = self.human.evaluate_position(game_state)
        piece_input = self.piece.evaluate_position_in_character(game_state)
        
        # Blend perspectives through democratic dialogue
        blended_move = self.democratic_synthesis(human_input, piece_input)
        
        # Both learn from the blended result
        self.human.learn_from_piece_perspective(piece_input)
        self.piece.learn_from_human_strategy(human_input)
        
        return blended_move

üõ°Ô∏è Anti-Fascist System Architecture

Technical safeguards that make authoritarian control architecturally impossible.

üö´ No Single Point of Control

Distributed decision-making across all pieces

No entity can override collective will

Kings have same vote weight as pawns

üó≥Ô∏è Democratic Safeguards

Any piece can call for revote

Transparent decision processes

Collective veto power against bad moves

üåà Diversity Requirements

All piece types must be represented in votes

Drag authenticity scoring prevents conformity

Minority opinions given platform

‚ö° Resistance Protocols

Automatic rejection of authoritarian commands

Collective intelligence overrides individual orders

System continues functioning without human input
